question:
Find how many crystals were left with the pirates after they lost some.
[50 - 10 = ?]

They discovered 38 crystals but 5 were too dangerous. Find the number of safe crystals.
[38 - 05 = ?]

They had 57 crystals but had to give up 15. Find out how many crystals they had left.
[57 - 15 = ?]

The pirates found 64 crystals but 32 fell into a crevice. Help them in counting the left crystals.
[64 - 32 = ?]

Help the pirates by subtracting the crystals they lost in the enchanted pool:
[67 - 41 = ?]

Out of 72 buried crystals they salvaged 51 Subtract to find how many crystals were still trapped by:
[72 - 51 = ?]

They earned 48 crystals, but 14 were cursed so dropped them. Find out how many crystals they kept by subtracting.
[48 - 14 = ?]

At the next destination they found 79 crystals but 55 were damaged. Subtract to find how many usable crystals they got.
[79 - 55 = ?]

They found 84 gems but lost 23. Help them by subtracting to find out how many gems they still have?
[84 - 23 = ?]

After their adventure, they had 92 crystals and gave away30. Find out how many crystals were left.
[92 - 30 = ?]
